title: Network Monitor
description: A Python application with a user-friendly interface to track devices on a network. Features include IP/MAC address blacklisting and ongoing threat detection development.

title: Bookstore
description: A Java Spring Boot application with user accounts, offering an online bookstore for easy browsing and purchasing.

title: Weather Forecast Website
description: A REST API-integrated site built with Java Spring Boot to provide global weather updates. Users can save favorite locations after signing up.

title: Smarthome App
description: A JavaFX-based UI project for controlling smart home devices, created during your first year in school.

title: Sudoku Game
description: A Java-based game offering Sudoku puzzles with varying difficulty levels for a fun and engaging challenge.
